title: Corporate Treasuries Are Slow to Adopt AI, Survey Finds
description: Treasury departments in global companies are struggling to adopt artificial intelligence tools, according to a Crisil Coalition Greenwich survey, underscoring how slowly the technology is penetrating a critical function in corporate finance.
content:
Treasury departments in global companies are struggling to adopt artificial intelligence tools, according to a Crisil Coalition Greenwich survey, underscoring how slowly the technology is penetrating a critical function in corporate finance.

title: Anthropic CEO says AI company ‘cannot in good conscience accede’ to Pentagon’s demands
description: WASHINGTON — Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said Thursday the artificial intelligence company “cannot in good conscience accede” to the Pentagon’s demands to allow wider use of its technology. title: DeSantis Breaks With Trump on AI Policy
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis is pressing lawmakers to curb the fast growth of artificial intelligence and the sprawling data centers that power it, staking out a consumer-focused posture that contrasts with President Donald Trump and other Republicans' positioning for 2028.

title: Burger King to bring AI-based voice coach to Canada
description: Artificial intelligence will start coaching some of Burger King’s Canadian staff later this year.
content:
Artificial intelligence will start coaching some of Burger King’s Canadian staff later this year.
The owner of the fast-food chain says it’s aiming to bring its new Patty tool to the country in the second half of 2026.
